title: Changes In Film Industry To Pan Out?
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
9 Sep 2015 02:42 AM EST 
The acquisition world keeps turning, and producers are looking at ways to get ahead of the game. UK Film4’s Bruce Smith, who, despite her ancillary concerns, still sees big potential upsides in the market says, “On some films, we are in early discussions with distributors to share in the upfront risk for a greater share of the back end." Producers face a confusing array of questions: Sell a feature outright to Netflix? License it to Amazon for North America and get a release through a partner theatrical distributor? Bring a traditional cable outlet into the deal? New players in the feature film space will likely be driving up bidding wars but many wonder if there’s enough gold at the end of the rainbow to support it all.
